reviews.review_msg: I dropped this course early in the semester because of poor teaching and irrelevant therefore hard assignments.  You will have to learn openGL by yourself because the lectures only talks about concepts.  His teaching ability is poor and unorganized.  I hope there is another professor for this course since I am interested on the course subject.

This prof is a joke.  He doesn't care about what he teaches, how he teaches it, or how it is graded.  TA is always right with this prof, even when proven wrong...he just doesn't care.  Takes 2 weeks to reply to emails...only 5 people passed final!  Guaranteed F for 80% of the class, this is only CMPT class I failed in Univ.  Avoid at all cost!

No unfavorable profs are this irresponsible. Lec mostly dictionary graphic terms, interesting but totally irrelevant to asns/tests. DIY Math and Program. Unclear asn. Don't even ask he won't help.  20/22 students fail MT. Tests w/ stuff not in lec or text. And plenty of F. This isn't even a course. Only wastes your time, $, GPA, graphic interest :(

I had unfavorable profs, but none are even close to this completely irresponsible one. Lec mostly graphic terms out of the dictionary, interesting but totally irrelevant to his asns and tests. Asn outline unclear and he offers almost no help. Around 20/22 students
Thinks before he says something. Knows the subject well.

Does a good job teaching a very tough course, this should not be a 3 credit course!  Has an extreme interest in the course material, thinks about what he says and can respond to difficult questions.  Coming out of this course, I felt comfortable enough to reimplement most of the algorithms discussed
The project had nothing to do with the class. He was just re-reading the book to us off his slides. Didn't learn any practical skills in animation just howto use maya which we taught ourselves.
He's by far the hottest prof in computing science.
TOUGH course, he teaches it as if it was 2 courses instead of 1!
i wouldn't complain if it were a 5 credit course
